attributes.action: curtail the fuel companies from recooping their anticipated costs from claims caused by contaminated unleaded petrol'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The oil companies make big enough profits from their products and I consider that for them to increase fuel costs across the board, is an insult to the car owning members of the public.

For these increases to be made to the cost of diesel (which is a product not affected directly by the fuel problems) is even more damaging, as it can affect the cost of living, (i.e. transport and public service vehicles).
